select music_play_record.id, music_play_record.user_id, music_play_record.music_id, music_play_record.create_date, user_info.code as userCode, user_info.name as userName, user_info.images as userImages, music_info.code as musicCode, music_info.name as musicName, music_info.images as musicImages, music_info.file_url, singer_info.code as singerCode, singer_info.name as singerName, singer_info.images as singerImages, singer_info.`identity`, music_type_info.name as typeName, album_info.code as albumCode, album_info.name as albumName, album_info.images as albumImages from music_play_record left join user_info on (user_info.id = music_play_record.user_id) left join music_info on (music_info.id = music_play_record.music_id) left join singer_info on (singer_info.id = music_info.singer_ids) left join music_type_info on (music_type_info.id = music_info.type_id) left join album_info on (album_info.id = music_info.album_id) where 1 = 1
AND user_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{musicInfo.userName},'%')
AND music_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{musicInfo.musicName},'%')
AND singer_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{musicInfo.singerName},'%')
AND album_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{musicInfo.albumName},'%')
order by music_play_record.create_date desc
